name: test-driven-architecture
description: This package generates architectural tests from solution definitions

scripts.wprod: clear && tsc && DEBUG=tda,denormalizer node dist/index.js -t ./data/typetests.json -s ./data/components.json -e ./data/architecture-prod.json -o build/summary-prod.html
scripts.wdev: clear && tsc && DEBUG=tda,denormalizer node dist/index.js -t ./data/typetests.json -s ./data/components.json -e ./data/architecture-dev.json -o build/summary-dev.html
scripts.wwork: clear && tsc && DEBUG=tda,denormalizer node dist/index.js -t ./data/typetests.json -s ./data/work.json -e ./data/work-architecture-prod.json -o build/summary-work.html

author: Phil Tomlinson
